member.name: T:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator
member.summary: Wrapper generator. Creates .cs source files using acumatica instance.

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.Username
member.summary: Username, will be used for wrapper generation login. Visiability of screens and controls will be restricted by user access rights. Default value is "admin"

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.Namespace
member.summary: Namespace, where wrapper class will be defined. Default value is "GeneratedWrappers.Acumatica".

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.ClearOutput
member.summary: Whether to clear GenResultPath folder or not

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.Postfix
member.summary: Postfix. Value will be used as subfolder name, first three letters will be added to wrapper class name. Set it, when you need several different wrappers for same screen, for example its default and customized variants.

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.CorrectCTL01
member.summary: In some cases, Class generator gains incorect control locators from ASP. Set true, if you want class generator to replace "ctl01" to "ctl00" in output to avoid this problem. Use with caution, because in most of cases this effect cased by incorrect user rights.

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.GenerateInterfaces
member.summary: Whether to generate interfaces for toolbar buttons or not

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.Screens
member.summary: List of screens with direct urls (e.g. GL307000, ~/Pages/GL/GL307000.aspx?WorkBookID=GL - url can be taken from the Sitemap)

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.GenericInquiries
member.summary: List of Generic Inquiries (e.g. GI000001, ?Name=Currency Rates History - query can be taken from the browser's address line)

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.Filters
member.summary: List of filters with wildcards, which will be used to process the screens from the site's folder (e.g. *.*px - will generate wrappers for all screens, GL301000 - will generate only the GL301000 screen)

member.name: P:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.ExcludedScreens
member.summary: List of screens, which will be excluded from the wrapper generation process (e.g. GL301000 - will exclude the GL301000 screen, excluding has the highest priority)

member.name: M:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Inits new instance of class generator
member.param: File system path to acumatica instance. Class Generator will copy its working file to specified directory, so it must be accessiable.
Folder where resulting .cs will be stored. Ensure it is accessiable.

member.name: M:ClassGenerator.ClassGenerator.Run(System.String)
member.param: Filter string with wildcards, separated by comma, which will be used to process screens from the site's folder (e.g. *.*px - will generate wrappers for all screens)
